author: Paul Vinnell
title: Blackburn Rovers appoint Tony Mowbray as new head coach | Football News | Sky Sports

organizations.name: football news | sky sports blackburn rovers

text:
Blackburn Rovers appoint Tony Mowbray as new head coach By Paul Vinnell Tony Mowbray has been appointed Blackburn head coach on an 18-month deal Blackburn Rovers have appointed Tony Mowbray as the clubâ€™s new head coach. 
Mowbray, 53, has agreed an 18-month contract at Ewood Park and replaces Owen Coyle, who was sacked on Tuesday. 
More to follow...
